comment.author: 84575910@N06
comment._content: ... the history of florida is somewhat tumultuous !  ... parts of florida were not florida @ one time.  there was east / west / north & south - even when the cross florida barge canal was in motion, there was "talk' of th@ canal being a border.  very interesting - florida's history !  * note * when travelin' 75 ; south of SR 200 (ocala) there be an "earthen bridge" ... & th@'s where the canal wouldah crossed !
